review: Lacking in Apps compared to my Roku stick, Also states that it should be faster but it is not compared to my Roku. Amazon needs to spend some focus on this product to make it a truly great product. Right now I would just rate it as average, performance and apps.
author: Vance S.

review: Notice the quality immediately as you open the box. Simple setup in five minutes. Have already watched three movies in two days, Would recommend this device.
author: Timothy Murphy

review: Absolutely the best money spent this year !  It has exceeded my expectations in all categories.
